Docs.param: The ExchangeService class object to which the calendar folder will be bound.
Docs.summary: Initializes an unsaved local instance of the CalendarFolder class. To bind to an existing calendar folder, use the Bind method.

Docs.param: The service to use to bind to the calendar folder.
The ID of the calendar folder to bind to.
Docs.summary: Binds to an existing calendar folder and loads its first class properties. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: An instance of the CalendarFolder class that represents the calendar folder that corresponds to the specified ID.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FindItemsResults<Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.Appointment> FindAppointments (Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarView view);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.FindItemsResults`1<class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.Appointment> FindAppointments(class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarView view) cil managed
Public Function FindAppointments (view As CalendarView) As FindItemsResults(Of Appointment)

public: Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FindItemsResults<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Appointment ^> ^ FindAppointments(Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::CalendarView ^ view);

Docs.param: The view that controls the range of appointments that are returned.
Docs.summary: Obtains a list of appointments by searching the contents of this folder and performing recurrence expansion for recurring appointments. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
Docs.returns: An object that represents the results of the search operation.
